item.title: CVE-2024-3268|2024-05-21T11:33:17.396Z -- emarket-design -- YouTube Video Gallery by YouTube Showcase – Video Gallery Plugin for WordPress
item.description: The YouTube Video Gallery by YouTube Showcase – Video Gallery Plugin for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the emd_form_builder_lite_submit_form function in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.6. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create arbitrary posts or pages.
